title: The Steve Harvey Roast Session + Charlotte Stand - Up Comedy | Ep. 136
itunes:title: The Steve Harvey Roast Session + Charlotte Stand - Up Comedy | Ep. 136
description:
Karlous Miler, DC Young Fly and Chico Bean talk to Steve Harvey about being the new wave of comedy, The 85 South Show, Black comedy history and more! Plus DC Young Fly asks he kicked The 85 South Show out of his studio! This weeks sponsor is CIVIC TAX RELIEF. Call their special tax hotline where they can help you discover all the relief programs You qualify for FREE. Just call 1-800-297-6014. CLAYTON ENGLISH - http://www.claytonenglish.com/ JOE T. NEWMAN - http://www.ayoungplayer.com CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/ LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_queso/ J.O.N - https://www.instagram.com/heeeyj_o_n/ CRIAG GRAVES - https://www.instagram.com/craigshoots23/
